full_summary:
**Handheld Barcode Scanners**
=====================================================

## Background

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites interested suppliers to submit bids for the procurement of Handheld Barcode Scanners. The requirement is for twenty (20) Handheld Barcode Scanners, with an optional purchase of an additional ten (10) units available for a period up to and including 30 September 2024.

## Procurement Details

*   **Procurement Reference**: PW-22-01003615
*   **Solicitation Number**: W8474-238289
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 28 September 2022, 1400
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 30 November 2022
*   **Procurement Category**: Government of Canada (GD)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.

## Requirements

The DND requires the Handheld Barcode Scanners for use within its existing data centre infrastructure. The infrastructure requires these devices to assist with functionality. The requirement, in its entirety, is detailed in the RFP at Annex “A” Requirement.

## Evaluation Criteria

The bid must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

## Contact Information

*   Brooke Monette
    Email: <brooke.monette@forces.gc.ca>

## Documents

The complete RFP package, including the bid solicitation and any amendments, is available on the Canada Buys website. Relevant documents are listed below:
